title: The Trojan Horse Affair - Part 4
description: A series of frustrating interviews with Birmingham politicians leaves Brian and Hamza wondering if crucial information about the Trojan Horse letter was kept from officials in London. Then one rainy Friday afternoon, Brian hears back from a government source who wants to meet right away.
author: rich@thislife.org (Serial Productions & The New York Times)
